p:
It is obvious that ln F is of linear dependence with logarithmic Ni 2+ concentration provided that other parameters are constants. The slope of the linear correlation ( n) could be found according to Equation (16). It infers that the slope is determined by the number of Sn vacancies and adsorbed Ni 2+ ions on the SnO 2 QD surface.
